comment: Virtual deduction proof of ~ sspwtr . This proof is the same as the proof of ~ sspwtr except each virtual deduction symbol is replaced by its non-virtual deduction symbol equivalent. A class which is a subclass of its power class is transitive. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 3-May-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
